title: Subs not seeing their board?
message: Firebot's auto grouping functionality requires a chat connection to see viewer roles. Make sure to connect to both. The event log will let you know when the auto grouper starts up.

title: Command Trigger Behavior Change
message: As of v4.4.5, chat command trigger behavior has been changed. It is no longer assumed that a command starts with "!", instead triggers are considered exactly how they are saved. Please update your current commands to include a "!" (or whatever you want) in their triggers.

title: Update Incoming! Back up recommended.
message: We will be releasing v4.5.0 shortly, we recommended heading to the Backup section in the settings tab and clicking Backup Now as this is a rather large update. We hope you enjoy all the new features!
